 </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:12pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Notice of 2018 Annual Meeting of Shareholders </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Fellow Kroger Shareholders:</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>It is our pleasure to invite
you to join our Board of Directors, senior leadership, and other Kroger associates at The Kroger Co. Annual Meeting of Shareholders. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">

<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top">Thursday, June&nbsp;28, 2018, at 11:00 a.m. eastern time.</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt">

<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>

<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Music Hall</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Music Hall Ballroom</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">1241 Elm Street</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Cincinnati, OH 45202</P></TD></TR>

<TD VALIGN="top"><B>Items of Business:</B></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.80em; text-indent:-1.80em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">1.&#8194;&#8201;&#8201;To elect 11 director nominees.</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.80em; text-indent:-1.80em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">2.&#8194;&#8201;&#8201;To approve our executive compensation, on an advisory basis.</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.80em; text-indent:-1.80em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">3.&#8194;&#8201;&#8201;To approve an amendment to our Regulations to adopt proxy access.</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.80em; text-indent:-1.80em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">4.&#8194;&#8201;&#8201;To approve an amendment to our Regulations to permit Board amendments in accordance with Ohio law.</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.80em; text-indent:-1.80em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">5.&#8194;&#8201;&#8201;To ratify the selection of our independent auditor for fiscal year 2018.</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.80em; text-indent:-1.80em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">6.&#8194;&#8201;&#8201;To vote on three shareholder proposals, if properly presented at the meeting.</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; margin-left:1.80em; text-indent:-1.80em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">7.&#8194;&#8201;&#8201;To transact other business as may properly come before the meeting.</P></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt">
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top"><B>Who can Vote:</B></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top">Holders of Kroger common shares at the close of business on the record date May&nbsp;2, 2018 are entitled to notice of and to vote at the meeting.</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt">
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top"><B>How to Vote:</B></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top">Your vote is important! Please vote your proxy in one of the following ways:</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt">
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.80em; text-indent:-1.80em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">1.<I>&#8194;&#8201;&#8201;Via the internet</I>, by visiting www.proxyvote.com.</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.80em; text-indent:-1.80em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">2.<I>&#8194;&#8201;&#8201;By telephone</I>, by calling the number on your proxy card, voting instruction form or notice.</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.80em; text-indent:-1.80em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">3.<I>&#8194;&#8201;&#8201;By mail</I>, by marking, signing, dating and mailing your proxy card if you requested printed
materials, or your voting instruction form. No postage is required if mailed in the United States.</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; margin-left:1.80em; text-indent:-1.80em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">4.<I>&#8194;&#8201;&#8201;In person</I>, by attending the meeting in Cincinnati.</P></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt">
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top"><B>Attending the Meeting:</B></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top">Shareholders holding shares at the close of business on the record date, or their duly appointed proxies, may attend the meeting. If you plan to attend the meeting, you must bring either: (1)&nbsp;the notice of meeting that was
separately mailed to you or (2)&nbsp;the top portion of your proxy card, either of which will be your admission ticket. You must also bring valid photo identification, such as a driver&#146;s license or passport. We reserve the right to exclude any
person who cannot provide an admission ticket and valid photo identification.</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt">
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top"><B>Webcast of the Meeting:</B></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top">If you are unable to attend the meeting, you may listen to a live webcast of the meeting by visiting ir.kroger.com at 11:00 a.m. eastern time on June&nbsp;28, 2018.</TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">We appreciate your continued confidence in Kroger, and we look forward to seeing you at the meeting. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="62%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="35%"></TD></TR>


<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="bottom">May &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, 2018</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">By Order of the Board of Directors,</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="bottom">Cincinnati, Ohio</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">Christine S. Wheatley, Secretary</TD></TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV></Center>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Proxy Statement </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="right">May &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, 2018 </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">We are providing
this notice, proxy statement and annual report to the shareholders of The Kroger Co. (&#147;Kroger&#148;, &#147;we&#148;, &#147;us&#148;, &#147;our&#148;) in connection with the solicitation of proxies by the Board of Directors of Kroger (the
&#147;Board&#148;) for use at the Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held on June&nbsp;28, 2018, at 11:00 a.m. eastern time, at the Music Hall Ballroom, Music Hall, 1241 Elm St., Cincinnati, Ohio 45202, and at any adjournments thereof. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Our principal executive offices are located at 1014 Vine Street, Cincinnati, Ohio 45202-1100. Our telephone number is <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap"><FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">513-762-4000.</FONT></FONT> This notice, proxy statement and annual report, and the accompanying proxy card were first furnished to shareholders on May &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, 2018. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Who can vote? </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">You can vote if, as of the close of business
on May&nbsp;2, 2018, you were a shareholder of record of Kroger common shares. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Who is asking for my vote, and who pays for this proxy solicitation? </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Your proxy is being solicited by Kroger&#146;s Board of Directors. Kroger is paying the cost of solicitation. We have hired D.F. King&nbsp;&amp; Co.,
Inc., 48 Wall Street, New York, New York, a proxy solicitation firm, to assist us in soliciting proxies and we will pay them a fee estimated not to exceed $17,500. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">We also will reimburse banks, brokers, nominees, and other fiduciaries for postage and reasonable expenses incurred by them in forwarding the proxy
material to beneficial owners of our common shares. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Proxies may be solicited personally, by telephone, electronically via the Internet, or by mail.
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Who are the members of the Proxy Committee? </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Robert D.
Beyer, W. Rodney McMullen, and Ronald L. Sargent, all Kroger Directors, are the members of the Proxy Committee for our 2018 Annual Meeting. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>How do I vote my
proxy? </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">You can vote your proxy in one of the following ways: </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><I>Via the internet,</I> by visiting www.proxyvote.com. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><I>By telephone,</I> by calling the number on your proxy card, voting instruction form, or notice. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><I>By mail,</I> by marking, signing, dating and mailing your proxy card if you requested printed materials, or your voting instruction form. No postage is required if mailed in the United States. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">4.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><I>In person,</I> by attending the meeting in Cincinnati. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>What do I need to attend the meeting in person in
Cincinnati? </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">If you plan to attend the meeting, you must bring either: (1)&nbsp;the notice of meeting that was separately mailed to you or
(2)&nbsp;the top portion of your proxy card, either of which will be your admission ticket. You must also bring valid photo identification, such as a driver&#146;s license or passport. We reserve the right to exclude any person who cannot provide an
admission ticket and valid photo identification. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Can I change or revoke my proxy? </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">The common shares represented by each proxy will be voted in the manner you specified unless your proxy is revoked before it is exercised. You may change
or revoke your proxy by providing written </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center">1 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">
notice to Kroger&#146;s Secretary at 1014 Vine Street, Cincinnati, Ohio 45202, in person at the meeting or by executing and sending us a subsequent proxy. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>How many shares are outstanding? </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">As of the close of business
on May&nbsp;2, 2018, the record date, our outstanding voting securities consisted of &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; common shares. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>How many votes per share? </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Each common share outstanding on
the record date will be entitled to one vote on each of the 11 director nominees and one vote on each other proposal. Shareholders may not cumulate votes in the election of directors. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>What voting instructions can I provide? </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">You may instruct the
proxies to vote &#147;For&#148; or &#147;Against&#148; each proposal, or you may instruct the proxies to &#147;Abstain&#148; from voting. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>What happens if proxy
cards or voting instruction forms are returned without instructions? </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">If you are a registered shareholder and you return your proxy card without
instructions, the Proxy Committee will vote in accordance with the recommendations of the Board. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">If you hold shares in street name and do not
provide your broker with specific voting instructions on proposals 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, or 8, which are considered <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-routine</FONT> matters, your broker does not have the authority to vote on those proposals. This is
generally referred to as a &#147;broker <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-vote.&#148;</FONT> Proposal 5, ratification of auditors, is considered a routine matter and, therefore, your broker may vote your shares according to your broker&#146;s
discretion. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">The vote required, including the effect of broker <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-votes</FONT> and abstentions for each of the
matters presented for shareholder vote, is set forth below. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>What are the voting requirements for each of the proposals? </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Proposal No.</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;1 Election of Directors</B>&nbsp;&#150;&nbsp;An affirmative vote of the majority of the total number of votes cast
&#147;For&#148; or &#147;Against&#148; a director nominee is required for the election of a director in an uncontested election. A majority of votes cast means that the number of shares voted &#147;For&#148; a director nominee must exceed the number
of votes &#147;Against&#148; such director. Broker <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-votes</FONT> and abstentions will have no effect on this proposal. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Proposal No.</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;2 Advisory Vote to Approve Executive Compensation</B>&nbsp;&#150;&nbsp;Advisory approval by shareholders of executive
compensation requires the affirmative vote of the majority of shares participating in the voting. Broker <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-votes</FONT> and abstentions will have no effect on this proposal. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Proposal No.</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;3 Vote to Approve Amendment to Regulations to Permit Proxy Access</B>&nbsp;&#150;&nbsp;An affirmative vote of the
majority of the outstanding shares is required to amend the Regulations to permit proxy access. Broker <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-votes</FONT> and abstentions will have the same effect as a vote against this proposal. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Proposal No.</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;4 Vote to Approve Amendment to Regulations to Permit Board Amendments in Accordance with Ohio
Law</B>&nbsp;&#150;&nbsp;An affirmative vote of 75% of the outstanding shares is required to amend the Regulations to permit Board amendments of certain provisions. Broker <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-votes</FONT> and abstentions will have
the same effect as a vote against this proposal. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Proposal No.</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;5 Ratification of Independent
Auditors</B>&nbsp;&#150;&nbsp;Ratification by shareholders of the selection of independent public accountants requires the affirmative vote of the majority of shares participating in the voting. Abstentions will have no effect on this proposal. </P>

 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center">2 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Proposal Nos. 6, 7, and 8 Shareholder Proposals</B>&nbsp;&#150;&nbsp;The affirmative vote of the
majority of shares participating in the voting on a shareholder proposal is required for such proposal to pass. Accordingly, broker <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-votes</FONT> and abstentions will have no effect on these proposals. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>How does the Board of Directors recommend that I vote? </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">

<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="5" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">

Ratification of Independent Auditors</P> <P STYLE="font-size:1pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt">&nbsp;</P></TD>

<TD HEIGHT="5" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8pt">&nbsp;</TD>

and 8 Shareholder Proposals</P> <P STYLE="font-size:1pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt">&nbsp;</P></TD>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P><div style="max-width:100%;margin-left:0%; margin-right:0%;border:solid 1px;background-color:;;padding-top:2pt;padding-bottom:3pt">
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-top:0pt; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Important Notice Regarding the Availability of Proxy Materials for the Shareholder </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1%; margin-right:1%; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Meeting to be Held on June&nbsp;28, 2018 </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1%; margin-right:1%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">The Notice of 2018 Annual Meeting, Proxy Statement and 2017 Annual Report and the means to vote by internet are
available at www.proxyvote.com. </P></div>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center">3 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Kroger&#146;s Corporate Governance Practices </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Kroger is committed to strong corporate governance. We believe that strong governance builds trust and promotes the long-term interests of our
shareholders. Highlights of our corporate governance practices include the following: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Board Governance Practices </B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Strong Board oversight of enterprise risk. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">All director nominees are independent, except for the CEO. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">All five Board committees are fully independent. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Robust code of ethics. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Annual evaluation of the Chairman and CEO by the independent directors, led by the independent Lead Director. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Annual Board and committee self-assessments. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Commitment to Board refreshment and diversity. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Regular executive sessions of the independent directors, at the Board and committee level. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Strong independent Lead Director with clearly defined role and responsibilities. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">High degree of Board interaction with management to ensure successful oversight and succession planning. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Shareholder
Rights </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">All directors are elected annually with a simple majority standard for all uncontested director elections and by plurality in contested director elections. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">No poison pill (shareholder rights plan). </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Shareholders have the right to call a special meeting. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Regular engagement with shareholders to understand their perspectives and concerns on a broad array of topics, including corporate governance matters. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Responsive to shareholder feedback. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Compensation Governance </B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Pay program tied to performance and business strategy. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Majority of pay is long-term and <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">at-risk</FONT> with no guaranteed bonuses or salary increases. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Stock ownership guidelines align executive and director interests with those of shareholders. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Prohibition on all hedging, pledging and short sales of Kroger securities by directors and executive officers. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman">&#10003;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">No tax <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">gross-up</FONT> payments to executives. </TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center">4 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Proposals to Shareholders </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Item&nbsp;No. 1. Election of Directors </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>You are being asked to elect 11
director nominees for a <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">one-year</FONT> term. The Board of Directors recommends that you vote FOR the election of all director nominees. </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">As of the date of this proxy statement, Kroger&#146;s Board of Directors consists of 11 members. All nominees, if elected at the 2018 Annual Meeting,
will serve until the annual meeting in 2019, or until their successors have been elected by the shareholders or by the Board pursuant to Kroger&#146;s Regulations, and qualified. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Kroger&#146;s Articles of Incorporation provide that the vote required for election of a director nominee by the shareholders, except in a contested
election or when cumulative voting is in effect, is the affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast for or against the election of a nominee. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">The experience, qualifications, attributes, and skills that led the Corporate Governance Committee and the Board to conclude that the following
individuals should serve as directors are set forth opposite each individual&#146;s name. The committee memberships stated below are those in effect as of the date of this proxy statement. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Nominees for Directors for Terms of Office Continuing until 2019 </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="24%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="74%"></TD></TR>


<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt">
<TD HEIGHT="5" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1.00pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="2" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1.00pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Nora A. Aufreiter</B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Age 58</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Director Since 2014</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><I>Committees:</I><I><BR></I>Financial Policy<BR>Public Responsibilities</P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #000000">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Ms.&nbsp;Aufreiter is a Director Emeritus of McKinsey&nbsp;&amp; Company, a global management consulting
firm. She retired in June 2014 after more than 27 years with McKinsey, most recently as a director and senior partner. During that time, she worked extensively in the U.S., Canada, and internationally with major retailers, financial institutions and
other consumer-facing companies. Before joining McKinsey, Ms.&nbsp;Aufreiter spent three years in financial services working in corporate finance and investment banking. She is a member of the Board of Directors of The Bank of Nova Scotia, The
Neiman Marcus Group, and Cadillac Fairview, one of North America&#146;s largest owners, operators and developers of commercial real estate. Ms.&nbsp;Aufreiter also serves on the boards of St. Michael&#146;s Hospital and the Canadian Opera Company,
and is a member of the Dean&#146;s Advisory Board for the Ivey Business School in Ontario, Canada.</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Ms.&nbsp;Aufreiter has over 30 years of broad business experience in a variety of retail sectors. Her vast experience in leading McKinsey&#146;s North American Retail
Practice, North American Branding service line and the Consumer Digital and Omnichannel service line is of particular value to the Board. She also brings to the Board valuable insight on commercial real estate.</P>
<P STYLE="font-size:1pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center">5 </P>

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">


<TR>

<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt">
<TD HEIGHT="5" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1.00pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="2" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1.00pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Robert D. Beyer<BR></B><I>Lead Director</I><B></B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Age 58</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Director Since 1999</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><I>Committees:</I><I><BR></I>Corporate Governance*<BR>Financial Policy</P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Mr.&nbsp;Beyer is Chairman of Chaparal Investments LLC, a private investment firm and holding company that he founded in 2009. From 2005 to 2009,
Mr.&nbsp;Beyer served as Chief Executive Officer of The TCW Group, Inc., a global investment management firm. From 2000 to 2005, he served as President and Chief Investment Officer of Trust Company of the West, the principal operating subsidiary of
TCW. Mr.&nbsp;Beyer is a member of the Board of Directors of Leucadia National Corporation. In the past five years he also served as a director of The Allstate Corporation.</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Mr.&nbsp;Beyer brings to Kroger his experience as CEO of TCW, a global investment management firm serving many of the largest institutional investors in the U.S. He has
exceptional insight into Kroger&#146;s financial strategy, and his experience qualifies him to serve as a member of the Board. While at TCW, he also conceived and developed the firm&#146;s risk management infrastructure, an experience that is useful
to Kroger&#146;s Board in performing its risk management oversight functions. His abilities and service as a director were recognized by his peers, who selected Mr.&nbsp;Beyer as an Outstanding Director in 2008 as part of the Outstanding Directors
Program of the Financial Times. His strong insights into corporate governance form the foundation of his leadership role as Lead Director on the Board.</P> <P STYLE="font-size:1pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt">
<TD HEIGHT="5" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1.00pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="2" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1.00pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Anne Gates</B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Age 58</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Director Since 2015</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><I>Committees:</I><I><BR></I>Audit<BR>Public Responsibilities</P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #000000">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Ms.&nbsp;Gates was President of MGA Entertainment, Inc., a privately-held developer, manufacturer and
marketer of toy and entertainment products for children, from 2014 until her retirement in 2017. Ms.&nbsp;Gates held roles of increasing responsibility with The Walt Disney Company from 1991-2012. Her roles included executive vice president, chief
financial officer for Disney Consumer Products, managing director for Disney Consumer Products Europe and Emerging Markets, and senior vice president of operations, planning and analysis. Prior to joining Disney, Ms.&nbsp;Gates worked for PepsiCo
and Bear Stearns. She is currently a director of Tapestry, Inc. (formerly known as Coach, Inc.) and Raymond James Financial, Inc.</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Ms.&nbsp;Gates has over 25 years of experience in the retail and consumer products industry. She brings to Kroger financial expertise gained while serving as President
of MGA and CFO of a division of The Walt Disney Company. Ms.&nbsp;Gates has a broad business background in finance, marketing, strategy and business development, including international business. Her expertise in toy and entertainment products is of
particular value to the Board. Ms.&nbsp;Gates has been designated an Audit Committee financial expert.</P> <P STYLE="font-size:1pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="line-height:1.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #000000;width:31%">&nbsp;</P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="24%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="74%"></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt">
<TD HEIGHT="5" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1.00pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="2" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1.00pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Mark S. Sutton</B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Age 56</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Director Since 2017</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><I>Committees:</I></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Audit</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Public Responsibilities</P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #000000">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Mr.&nbsp;Sutton is Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of International Paper, a leading global producer
of renewable fiber-based packaging, pulp and paper products. Prior to becoming CEO, he served as President and Chief Operating Officer with responsibility for running the company&#146;s global business. Mr.&nbsp;Sutton joined International Paper in
1984 as an electrical engineer. He held roles of increasing responsibility throughout his career, including mill manager, Vice President of corrugated packaging operations across Europe, the Middle East and Africa, Vice President of corporate
strategic planning, and Senior Vice President of several business units, including global supply chain, before being named CEO in 2014. He serves on the boards of the American Forest&nbsp;&amp; Paper Association, the Business Roundtable, the
International Advisory Board of the Moscow School of Management&nbsp;&#151;&nbsp;Skolkovo, Memphis Tomorrow and the New Memphis Institute.</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Mr.&nbsp;Sutton has over thirty years of leadership experience with increasing levels of responsibility and leadership at International Paper. He brings to the Board the
critical thinking that comes with an electrical engineering background as well as his experience leading a global company. His strong strategic planning background and supply chain experience are of particular value to the Board. Mr.&nbsp;Sutton has
been designated an Audit Committee financial expert.</P> <P STYLE="font-size:1pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>The Board of Directors Recommends a Vote <U>For</U> Each Director Nominee. </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Diversity of Background </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Our director nominees possess relevant experience,
skills and qualifications that contribute to a well-functioning Board that effectively oversees the Company&#146;s strategy and management. Listed below are the skills and experience that we consider important for our directors in light of our
current business, strategy and structure: </P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="font-size:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:8pt" ALIGN="center">

<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" COLSPAN="4" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT COLOR="#666666"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" COLOR="#666666"><FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE:70%">&#127761;</FONT></FONT></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="4" VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" COLSPAN="4" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT COLOR="#666666"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" COLOR="#666666"><FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE:70%">&#127761;</FONT></FONT></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="4" VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="4" VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" COLSPAN="4" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT COLOR="#666666"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" COLOR="#666666"><FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE:70%">&#127761;</FONT></FONT></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="4" VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" COLSPAN="4" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT COLOR="#666666"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" COLOR="#666666"><FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE:70%">&#127761;</FONT></FONT></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" BGCOLOR="#666666" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3" BGCOLOR="#666666">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3" BGCOLOR="#666666"><FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF"><B>&nbsp;</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3" BGCOLOR="#666666" ALIGN="right"><FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF"><B>6</B></FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #c9d6d3; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3; padding-right:2pt" BGCOLOR="#666666"><FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF"><B></B></FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt">
<TD HEIGHT="5" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #c9d6d3; padding-left:8pt" BGCOLOR="#ededed">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="5"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="5"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="5"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="5"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="5"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="5"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="5"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="5"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="5"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="5"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="5"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="5" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #c9d6d3" BGCOLOR="#666666">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:8pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #c9d6d3; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3; padding-left:8pt" BGCOLOR="#ededed">
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:8pt; font-family:ARIAL">Manufacturing</P> <P STYLE="font-size:8pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt">&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="4" VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="4" VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" COLSPAN="4" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT COLOR="#666666"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" COLOR="#666666"><FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE:70%">&#127761;</FONT></FONT></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" COLSPAN="4" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT COLOR="#666666"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" COLOR="#666666"><FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE:70%">&#127761;</FONT></FONT></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="4" VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="4" VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" COLSPAN="4" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT COLOR="#666666"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" COLOR="#666666"><FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE:70%">&#127761;</FONT></FONT></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="4" VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="4" VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="4" VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" COLSPAN="4" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3"><FONT COLOR="#666666"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" COLOR="#666666"><FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE:70%">&#127761;</FONT></FONT></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" BGCOLOR="#666666" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3" BGCOLOR="#666666">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3" BGCOLOR="#666666"><FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF"><B>&nbsp;</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3" BGCOLOR="#666666" ALIGN="right"><FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF"><B>4</B></FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #c9d6d3; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #c9d6d3; padding-right:2pt" BGCOLOR="#666666"><FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF"><B></B></FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center">9 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="47%"></TD></TR>


<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="bottom"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" ALIGN="center">


<IMG SRC="g457260g54l08.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
</P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt" align="left">&nbsp;</P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center">


<IMG SRC="g457260g04b29.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
</TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Information Concerning the Board of Directors </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Board Leadership Structure and Lead Independent Director </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">The
Board is currently composed of ten independent <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-employee</FONT> directors and one management director, Mr.&nbsp;McMullen, the Chairman and CEO. Kroger has a governance structure in which independent directors
exercise meaningful and vigorous oversight. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">As provided in Kroger&#146;s <I>Guidelines on Issues of Corporate Governance </I>(the
&#147;<I>Guidelines</I>&#148;), the Board has designated one of the independent directors as Lead Director. The Lead Director works with the Chairman to share governance responsibilities, facilitate the development of Kroger&#146;s strategy and grow
shareholder value. The Lead Director serves a variety of roles, consistent with current best practices, including: </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">reviewing and approving Board meeting agendas, materials and schedules to confirm that the appropriate topics are reviewed, with sufficient information provided to directors on each topic and appropriate time is
allocated to each; </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">serving as the principal liaison between the Chairman, management and the independent directors; </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">presiding at the executive sessions of independent directors and at all other meetings of the Board at which the Chairman is not present; </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">calling meetings of independent directors at any time; and </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">serving as the Board&#146;s representative for any consultation and direct communication, following a request, with major shareholders. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">The Lead Director carries out these responsibilities in numerous ways, including: </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">facilitating communication and collegiality among the Board; </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">soliciting direct feedback from <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-employee</FONT> directors; </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">overseeing the succession process, including site visits and meeting with a wide range of employees including corporate and division management associates; </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">meeting with the CEO frequently to discuss strategy; </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">serving as a sounding board and advisor to the CEO; and </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">discussing Company matters with other directors between meetings. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Unless otherwise determined by the
independent members of the Board, the Chair of the Corporate Governance Committee is designated as the Lead Director. Robert D. Beyer, an </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center">10 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">
independent director and the Chair of the Corporate Governance Committee, is currently the Lead Director. Mr.&nbsp;Beyer is an effective Lead Director for Kroger due to, among other things: </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">his independence; </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">his deep strategic and operational understanding of Kroger obtained while serving as a Kroger director; </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">his insight into corporate governance, his experience as the CEO of a global investment management firm; </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">his experience on the boards of other large publicly traded companies; and </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">his engagement and commitment to carrying out the role and responsibilities of the Lead Director. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">With
respect to the roles of Chairman and CEO, the <I>Guidelines</I> provide that the Board will determine whether it is in the best interests of Kroger and our shareholders for the roles to be combined. The Board exercises this judgment as it deems
appropriate in light of prevailing circumstances. Upon retirement of our former Chairman, David B. Dillon, on December&nbsp;31, 2014, the Board determined that it is in the best interests of Kroger and our shareholders for one person to serve as the
Chairman and CEO, as was the case from 2004 through 2013, with another individual serving as independent Lead Director. The Board believes that this leadership structure improves the Board&#146;s ability to focus on key policy and operational issues
and helps the Company operate in the long-term interest of shareholders. Additionally, this structure provides an effective balance between strong Company leadership and appropriate safeguards and oversight by independent directors. The Board
believes that the structure of the Chairman and independent Lead Director position should continue to be considered as part of the succession planning process. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Annual Board Evaluation Process </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">The Board and each of its
committees conduct an annual self-evaluation to determine whether the Board is functioning effectively both at the Board and at the committee levels. As part of this annual self-evaluation, the Board assesses whether the current leadership structure
and function continues to be appropriate for Kroger and its shareholders. The <I>Guidelines</I> provide the flexibility for the Board to modify our leadership structure in the future as appropriate. We believe that Kroger, like many U.S. companies,
is well-served by this flexible leadership structure. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">The Board recognizes that a robust evaluation process is an essential component of strong
corporate governance practices and promoting Board effectiveness. The Corporate Governance Committee oversees an annual evaluation process led by the Lead Independent Director (who also serves as Chair of the Corporate Governance Committee). </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">Each director completes an annual self-evaluation of the Board and the committees on which he or she serves. These self-evaluations are designed to help
assess the skills, qualifications, and experience represented on the Board and its committees, and to determine whether the Board and its committees are functioning effectively. The results of this annual self-evaluation are discussed by the full
Board and each committee, as applicable, and changes to the Board&#146;s and its committees&#146; practices are implemented as appropriate. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Committees of the
Board of Directors </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">To assist the Board in undertaking its responsibilities, and to allow deeper engagement in certain areas of company
oversight, the Board has established five standing committees: Audit, Compensation and Talent Development (&#147;Compensation&#148;), Corporate Governance, Financial Policy and Public Responsibilities. All committees are composed exclusively of
independent directors, as determined under the NYSE listing standards. The current charter of each Board committee is available on our website at ir.kroger.com under Investors&nbsp;&#151;Governance&nbsp;&#151;&nbsp;Committee Composition. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center">11 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="39%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="1%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="60%"></TD></TR>

<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#cccccc" STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1.50pt solid #000000"><B>Name of Committee, Number of<BR>Meetings, and Current Members</B></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1.50pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1.50pt solid #000000"><B>Committee Functions</B></TD></TR>


<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt">
<TD HEIGHT="5"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Audit Committee</B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Meetings in 2017: 5</B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; margin-left:1.40em; text-indent:-1.40em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Members:</B><B><BR></B>Ronald L. Sargent,
<I>Chair</I><I><BR></I>Anne Gates<BR>Bobby S. Shackouls<BR>Mark S. Sutton</P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">&#149;&#8194;&#8202;Oversees the Company&#146;s financial reporting
and accounting matters, including review of the Company&#146;s financial statements and the audit thereof, the Company&#146;s financial reporting and accounting process, and the Company&#146;s systems of internal control over financial reporting</P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">&#149;&#8194;&#8202;Selects, evaluates and oversees the
compensation and work of the independent registered public accounting firm and reviews its performance, qualifications, and independence</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">&#149;&#8194;&#8202;Oversees and evaluates the Company&#146;s internal audit function, including review of its audit plan,
policies and procedures and significant findings</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">&#149;&#8194;&#8202;Oversees risk assessment and risk management, including review of cybersecurity risks as well as legal or
regulatory matters that could have a significant effect on the Company</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">&#149;&#8194;&#8202;Reviews and monitors the Company&#146;s compliance programs, including the whistleblower program</P>
<P STYLE="font-size:1pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt">
<TD HEIGHT="5"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Compensation Committee</B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Meetings in 2017: 5</B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; margin-left:1.40em; text-indent:-1.40em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Members:</B><B><BR></B>Clyde R. Moore,
<I>Chair</I><I><BR></I>Susan J. Kropf<I><BR></I>Jorge P. Montoya<BR>James A. Runde</P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE=" BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">&#149;&#8194;&#8202;Recommends for approval by the independent
directors the compensation of the CEO, and approves the compensation of other senior management</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">&#149;&#8194;&#8202;Administers the Company&#146;s executive compensation policies and programs, including determining grants of
equity awards under the plans</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">&#149;&#8194;&#8202;Has
sole authority to retain and direct the committee&#146;s compensation consultant</P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL">&#149;&#8194;&#8202;Assists the full Board with senior management succession planning</P>
<P STYLE="font-size:1pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="font-size:1pt">
<TD HEIGHT="5"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="page-break-inside:avoid ; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:10pt">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00pt solid #000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Corporate Governance Committee</B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Meetings in 2017: 2</B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; margin-left:1.40em; text-indent:-1.40em; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL"><B>Members:</B><B><BR></B>Robert D. Beyer,
